articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT nader (🧱, 🚀) | nader.lens
Cross-chain apps ⛓ (xapps) are *really* cool and will be a huge part of how UX improves over time.
This is the first developer tutorial I've seen for building one that was approachable enough for me to try. 
Awesome work @camiinthisthang, will be trying out @ConnextNetwork!
cami ᵍᵐ ⛽🌴: Been really interested in cross-chain and shared some thoughts on the need for cross-chain dapps for widespread adoption.
Learn how to build cross-chain dapps with @ConnextNetwork by adding a few lines of code to your contract in this Developer Guide⛓️⛓️
 https://mirror.xyz/camiinthisthang.eth/brMeLKywJRgs7jMm_5nlr6uG43X_2u_5SYcO1_YrW4c
articles.title: RT nader (🧱, 🚀) | nader.lens: Cross-chain apps ⛓ (xapps) are *really* cool and will be a huge part of how UX improves over time. This is the fi...

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Sania García
*loudly blows nose* I'd like to dedicate my @developer_dao membership to the girls at @_HerDAO for web3-pilling me, to @dabit3 for being nader dabit, and to those who are giving me a big grant very soon but don't know it yet 🥹✨

DevNTell: Thank you everyone for the wonderful nominations for the @developer_dao #DevNTell contest!
Congratulations to the newest members of D_D 🥳
- @iits_hassan
- @SaniaGarciaDev
- @dbring1
Be on the lookout for a dm from this account with instructions on how to get your membership
